coursesList.title: Welcome To Codecademy
coursesList.descr: First time on our site? Start here to learn how to use our platform.

coursesList.title: Learn How to Code
coursesList.descr: Learn key programming concepts and write your first lines of code!

coursesList.title: Introduction to HTML
coursesList.descr: In just 7 hours, learn the basics of HTML5 and start building & editing web pages.

coursesList.title: Learn Python 3
coursesList.descr: Learn the latest and greatest version of the most popular programming language in the world!

coursesList.title: Learn Python 2
coursesList.descr: Learn the basics of the world's fastest growing and most popular programming language used by software engineers, analysts, data scientists, and machine learning engineers alike.

coursesList.title: Introduction To JavaScript
coursesList.descr: Learn the JavaScript fundamentals you'll need for front-end or back-end development.

coursesList.title: Learn Java
